text: Va [jod kun] hangome ki Parvardigorat ʙa faristagon guft: "Man dar zamin [ʙaroi ʙasari nomas'ulu ʙeixtijor] conisine xoham gumost [ki mas'ulu mukallaf ast]. Onon guftand: Ojo kasero dar on co megumori, ki taʙahkori va xunrezi kunad, dar hole ki mo Turo ʙo sipos ʙa poki mesitoem va taqdis mekunem? Alloh taolo guft: "Man [dar ʙorai hadafu maslihati ofarinisi u] cizhoe medonam, ki sumo namedoned
